span: You Did Need That Finger Print Scanner to Work Did You?
review-date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2025
review-text: Wow what a piece of garage. Who in their right mind thought replacing a hardware finger print scanner with some touch screen knock off was a good idea?  Works about 90 % of no.  It pretty much never works. Once on, the phone is slow and sluggish. It's totally bloated with Samsung wear you can't get rid of much of which is running in the background reporting your every move. (don't belive it, install duckduckgo browser and turn on app tracking blocker, see what comes up). My TCL 30V 5g was faster.  Screen touches where the app clearly responds do nothing. Long press for cut / copy / paste is laggy. Camera is Meh at best (considering all the hype). If security is important to you look elsewhere. The lack of a dedicated hardware  fingerprint reader is a deal breaker. This was my first Samsung in a phone going back to 08. It will probably be much last. At least this price, things should actually work. Too many thongs here don't.

span: Buyer beware  cannot update phone software ot security patches
review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2026
review-text: The phone arrived in excellent condition.  No problems with condition.  My problem that this " Factory Unlocked" is actually carrier unlocked with a generic firmware . Because of this it makes it unable to recieve Software updates. I think this should have been stated in the description.  Now I am waiting on replacement that wil. Mostly likely have the same issue, but the 2 options given as solutions were not good. Refund being the other. If replacement arrives and has same problem . This I will be have to see if I can pay to have firmware refreshed. . Instead of trying my self and bricking the phone.  If this was stated in the description  I would not be as unsatisfied as I am

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2026
review-text: Beware of the return policy.  I purchased this phone in October 2025, and it worked until January 2026.It will no longer charge completely.  The listing now shows a 90 day return policy so I tried to get a replacement.  I am told that Amazon changed their return policy for October 2025 to 30 days rather than 90 days so I don't qualify for a replacement.  It was changed back to 90 days in November.  Very convenient!  I am screwed. $300.00 + for a phone that didn't even last 90 days.

span: BEWARE OF LOCKED PHONES  BEING SOLD AS UNLOCKED
review-date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2025
review-text: BEWARE! When ordering this phone it is said to be unlocked renewed. The phone I received was not truly unlocked and took 8 months for us to find there was a restriction on the phone.  The phone was FORCED unlocked which means it will not update.  The phone I received model name is SM-S916U and locked to T Mobile.  An UNLOCKED phone is SM-S916U1 and can get updates.  Samsung, Mint, or Amazon cannot remove the restriction.  Make sure U1 is on the model name to get an unlocked phone. It came be sold as unlocked and not be.  Check the model send it back immediately if it is the wrong model.  I learned the hard way.  I had to choose 1 star.

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2026
review-text: Will NEVER use Senergy again for phone. Sent a phone that has hardware issue that has turned off on its own twice in 30 min. There is no customer support over the phone and can only talk through text. Worthless company stay away.

span: More of a headache then it's worth
review-date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2025
review-text: Do not buy my wife and I ordered 2 phones from this seller when we received them they looked great and hers works very well mine would not update too new software after trying to order a replacement they refused and only offered a partial refund even though I had the phone for less then a week ordering from this seller has been the biggest headache I've ever experienced

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2026
review-text: Phone case does not sit flat due to the camera protector being raised too high. Wanted to like it bit the first time in my car it went flying. This is not a good case.

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2025
review-text: Blown speaker right from the box... it was so obvious- you would have to work harder NOT to notice than to notice, unless they didn't quality check it at all. It was so bad a woman in the phone store was complaining about her A15 speaker and hers had better sound. At least her phone you could understand words! My phone sounded like it was underwater. I don't know how it made it out the door...

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2025
review-text: Phone was locked to T-Mobile. Don't advertise an unlocked phone just to have it locked. Huge waste of time having to send it back. Battery on this one seems to drain pretty fast too.
